name: Lazer Dodger (KobaDesu, FoxBall)
description:
Begin Dodging!

Lazer Dodger is a game about dodging lazers! Use your mouse or drag your finger to move the spaceship and don't get hit! Try and aim for the world record in both Dodge and X-Treme mode!

To unlock X-Treme mode, you need to dodge 100 lazers in Dodge.
Good luck!

Available for both PC and Android.
